name: The clasp of Lucifer
data: It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users dexterity ILLEGALLY.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It decreases the users intelligence pathetically.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration like a god.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
